meanings.definition: One who listens or pays attention.
meanings.sent1: The hearkener heard every word the teacher said.
meanings.sent2: The hearkener at the meeting was very attentive.
meanings.sent3: The hearkener could hear a pin drop in the quiet room.
meanings.sent4: She was a hearkener to the whispers of the wind.
meanings.sent5: The hearkener's ears were always open to new ideas.

meanings.sent1: I hearkener to the sound of birds chirping in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She hearkeners carefully to the instructions given by her boss.
meanings.sent3: The cat hearkenered to the mouse scurrying across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The trees hearkenered to the wind's gentle whispers.
meanings.sent5: He hearkenered to the advice of his elders with respect.
